title: Abbreviated conjunction and disjunction of three wff's - extension

blocks.name: 3an4ancom24
blocks.content: Commutative law for a conjunction with a triple conjunction: second and forth positions interchanged. (Contributed by AV, 18-Feb-2022.)

blocks.name: 4an21
blocks.content: Rearrangement of 4 conjuncts with a triple conjunction. (Contributed by AV, 4-Mar-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm 4an21(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wb(w3a(wa(w0, w1), w2, w3), wa(w1, w3a(w0, w2, w3)))
} = {
  bitri(w3a(wa(w0, w1), w2, w3), wa(w1, w3a(w0, w2, w3)), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)))
  3anass(wa(w0, w1), w2, w3)
  bitri(wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3)), wa(w1, w3a(w0, w2, w3)), wa(wa(w1, w0), wa(w2, w3)))
  anbi1i(wa(w0, w1), wa(w2, w3), wa(w1, w0))
  ancom(w0, w1)
  bitri(wa(wa(w1, w0), wa(w2, w3)), wa(w1, w3a(w0, w2, w3)), wa(w1, wa(w0, wa(w2, w3))))
  anass(w1, w0, wa(w2, w3))
  anbi2i(w1, wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)), w3a(w0, w2, w3))
  bicomi(wa(w0, wa(w2, w3)), w3a(w0, w2, w3))
  3anass(w0, w2, w3)
}
